config.timestamp.column.name: LAST_MODIFIED_DATE
config.query: SELECT sc.IMAGE_STYLEID AS STYLE_ID, BRAND_ID, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE FROM MERCH.STYLES INNER JOIN ELCAT.STYLE_COLOURS sc ON SUBSTR(sc.STYLEID,1,8) = STYLE_ID AND BRAND_ID IN ('1','2','3') WHERE LAST_MODIFIED_DATE >= sysdate - interval '300' minute
